mapper.insert: insert into user(id, pwd, name, gender, email, address1, address2, join_date, birth_date, tel) values(#{id},#{pwd},#{name},#{gender},#{email},#{address1},#{address1},now(),#{birth_date},#{tel})
mapper.update: update user set pwd = #{pwd}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address1}, birth_date = #{birth_date}, tel = #{tel} where uid = #{uid}
update user set pwd = '0000' where uid = 1
